div.ab:
Enamel
takes more readily on
copper
than on
silver
. It is true that the cut needs to be well hollowed out & rough.
Azure in body
& the red called gules,
white enamel
& dense green take to it very well. Having
enamelled
, one
gilds
the
foeillages
of the engraving
.
Copper
has a similar hardness for engraving as
fine silver
or
pistolet
gold
.
